decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (1480/1A (site plan includied proposed cycle shelter), 1480/3C, 109/Existing FP, 109/FPP (Proposed ground floor plan), Eco Shelter Range specification (Urbanshelters Ltd), Sustainability Assessment (dated 20th December 2017) Received: 28 December 2017) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 4 - Before the extension hereby permitted is brought into use the cycle parking facilities shown on the approved drawing 1480/1A (site plan includied proposed cycle shelter) and Eco Shelter Range specification (Urbanshelters Ltd) Received: 28 December 2017 shall be provided and thereafter retained as such.

Condition : 5 - Prior to first occupation of the extension hereby permitted an evidence pack (including for example manufactures literature, post construction reports, photos and statements of compliance) shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority to show that the development has been constructed in accordance with the approved Sustainability Assessment (dated 20th December 2017)
Condition : 6 - No more than 225 people shall be employed at the site at any one time without the written authorisation of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 7 - The extension hereby approved shall be used for for B1c, B2 and B8 purposes and ancillary to the use of the building to which the extension would be adjoined and for no other purposes (including any other purpose in Class B of the Schedule to the Town and Country Planning (Use Classes) Order 1987 or any other provision equivalent to that Class in any statutory instrument revoking and re-enacting that Order with or without modification).

Condition : 8 - "Before the development hereby permitted commences the applicant must either:
a.	Investigate the site for landfill gas to the satisfaction of the LPA, to ascertain whether gas protection measures are required.  Where measures are required the details shall be submitted to, and approved by, the LPA.
Or;
b.	The applicant shall install gas protection measures as a precautionary measure without first investigating the site.  The details of these measures shall be submitted to, and approved by, the LPA.
c.	For a. and b. all required measures shall be installed before the development is first occupied.

Condition : 9 - The existing vehicular crossover on the south-eastern elevation of the application site, adjacent to the development hereby permitted, shall be made good, and the kerb and verge/footway reinstated, at the expense of the applicant, prior to the first occupation of the hereby approved single storey rear extension.
